attributes.action: free council tax for parents with disabled children
attributes.additional_details: Coumcil tax needs to be free for those with children who are disabled, this would help save families who are working and struggling one thousand pounds a year. Mr cameron promiced top help parents with disabled children when he was trying to become prime minister and up to now as failed us all, he as took my suport workers away and my restbite care. Please support this motion and help us.
